"[NGS] Story Skip Tickets":
"[NGS] Story Skip Tickets are items which allow you to skip through the Main Story to the beginning of the most recent chapter.

They can be purchased from the AC Shop, and can only be used in ARKS Bases such as Central City."

"This item cannot be used in the following situations:

・You have already progressed to the latest chapter of the Main Story
・You are in a Party
・You are in matchmaking for a Quest"
